global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed 2019-12-12 22:31:16 UTC and recovered 2020-03-02 07:50:00 UTC. It was initially deployed to the Slope Sea 1 (SS-1) line but re-assigned to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1). The DVL was disabled 2020-02-04 and all other sensors were disabled 2020-02-21 to preserve power. This was a normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_380
